name: Cocooning Hoodie
description: The Cocooning hoodie envelops you in that rarest of luxuries - the ease of being truly at peace. The hooded round-neck design wraps you in the plush, jersey-knit luxury of cashmere fleece with an enveloping soft cut and a roomy patch pocket at the front. Ideal for leisurely days and evenings.

name: Jubilee Polo Shirt
description: Spun from the first delicate downy tufts of the cashmere kid, Baby Cashmere is an exquisite rarity - ethereally soft, ultra-fine fibres that whisper of nature's most precious gifts. This buttonless, long-sleeved polo shirt is a testament to the exquisite quality of yarn, whose dense cable pattern creates a tactile landscape of warmth and comfort. The natural colour of this precious fibre is preserved, allowing its inherent beauty to shine through.

name: Cocooning Turtleneck
description: The Cocooning turtleneck envelops you in that rarest of luxuries - the ease of being truly at peace. This oversized knit is draped in exquisite cashmere fleece jersey. Unparalleled comfort with carefree sophistication.

name: Cocooning Trousers
description: The Cocooning trousers envelop you in that rarest of luxuries - the ease of being truly at peace. Lounge in this loose pair crafted from cashmere fleece jersey. Wrapping your legs in a cosy, plush knit, they are ideal for downtime.

name: Cocooning Crewneck
description: The Cocooning crewneck envelops you in that rarest of luxuries - the ease of being truly at peace. Cuddle up in sumptuous, relaxed sophistication with this oversized, long-sleeved crewneck jumper, crafted from fine cashmere fleece jersey and enhanced with dropped shoulder seams. Perfect for everyday casual wear.

name: Katharina Sneaker
description: For outdoor enthusiasts seeking refined performance, this classic hiking shoe is the result of an elegant collaboration between Lupiano and ROA. A reworking of ROA's signature Katharina shoe, the upper showcases Lupiano's impeccable fabric, accented by supple suede details. Highly flexible, it adapts seamlessly to a variety of terrains, providing a firm grip for hikes while remaining remarkably comfortable for everyday wear.

name: Jase Gilet
description: The Jase gilet revels in the timeless appeal of denim, an ode to the time-honoured traditions of craftsmanship and the rugged organic texture that has delighted generations. Exuding easy sophistication, this unlined gilet is crafted from exclusive CashDenim® to a loose, relaxed fit. A distinctive standing collar in baby camel knit frames the neckline, while exposed patch pockets and a placket with visible buttons concealing the zip fastening add textural touches.

name: Buttonless Polo-shirt
description: Polo crafted from Wish® wool, exceptionally fine fibre from selected Merino sheep bred in Australia and New Zealand. The knitted fabric has a clean, compact look. Relaxed cut with dropped shoulder.

name: Loom Weekender Bag L50
description: The Loom Weekender bag pays homage to Lupiano's centuries-old textile heritage, with the metal bar beneath the flap evoking the gentle cascade of fabric draped across an artisan's loom - a subtle nod to the brand's storied weaving techniques. Uniquely textured yet lightweight in a beautiful blend of cashmere and silk, the refined padlock that closes the bag can be unfastened, giving it a more relaxed look. Loom can be worn closed or open without losing charm and personality. Even when worn unfolded, the bag gracefully closes by itself. The perfect bag for a weekend getaway.

name: Mees Trousers
description: Silently defying gravity and the cold, the Mees trousers are a second skin of ingenuity, offering warmth to your body as you glide through the alpine air. This regular-fit wool pair wraps the legs in technical comfort, with a straight leg design that tapers slightly at the bottom for a sleek silhouette. The fully water-repellent finish adds a sporty edge to this sophisticated piece.
